description: Diantha`s Gourgeist was revealed during her Masters Eight tournament battle against Lance. It faced Lance`s Gyarados (Red Gyarados) and was the second Pok√©mon she used in the match. The match-up was dictated by Trick-or-Treat making Gyarados a Ghost-type and Gourgeist using its Ghost-type moves to deal Super Effective damage against it. It swiftly defeated Gyarados. It then faced Lance`s Hydreigon and was defeated.
name: Pumpjin (Carne)
